channel.title: npm on Bablvsj's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in npm on Bablvsj's Blog

item.title: npm install 报错和取消本地代理的问题
item.description: npm install下载依赖包的时候出现下面错误，请求失败。 1 npm ERR! FetchError: request to https://registry.npm.taobao.org/cnpm failed, reason: connect ECONNREFUSED 127.0.0.1:1181 调试过后发现是本地代理的问题，取消它。 1 2 npm config delete proxy npm config delete https-proxy npm
